      17             : // sign(a - b) * min(abs(a - b), max(0, strength - (abs(a - b) >> adjdamp)))

      26             :                  v128_min_u8(diff, v128_ssub_u8(v128_dup_8(strength),
      27             :                                                 v128_shr_u8(diff, adjdamp)))),
